line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Mine minerals in the sector.
* Add a fudge factor to help us from losing drones and cargo
* Get the total counts of inspace and in cargo bay drones.
* Here we guard against a fatal condition where there are no drones to carry out orders.
* We have enough drones to do mining
* Deploy drones against targetted wares and debris.
* Forget collecting minerals, the real money is in wares! :)
* This is a made up value. I have no idea right now what the proper ratio is
* We don't have enough drones to do anything.

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Mine minerals in the sector.
Add a fudge factor to help us from losing drones and cargo
Get the total counts of inspace and in cargo bay drones.
Here we guard against a fatal condition where there are no drones to carry out orders.
We have enough drones to do mining
Deploy drones against targetted wares and debris.
Forget collecting minerals, the real money is in wares! :)
This is a made up value. I have no idea right now what the proper ratio is
We don't have enough drones to do anything.
